Hello,
We noticed that you have requested refunds or replacements for a large number of orders because you reported that you did not receive your package.
We understand that occasional problems with orders are expected in the normal course of business. However, the unusually high number of lost orders that you have reported with your Amazon.com Marketplace orders exceeds this occasional expectation.
As a result, we are unable to guarantee delivery on any future orders you place with Marketplace sellers on Amazon.com.
When we see unusual account activity like this, we review each account on a case-by-case basis to determine if additional action or account closure is necessary. If this problem continues, we may not allow you to buy on our site. 
You can view our Conditions of Use here:
